row 1 along your chain double_crochet in the third stitch from the hook skip 1 granny cluster in the next stitch skip 2 granny cluster * repeat to the end of the row 2 double_crochet in the last stitch turn your work how to start the dress row 1 & 2 repeat row 2 and 3 until you are ready to begin the neckline blue dress 11 row before neckline decreases 38 total green dress 13 row before neckline decreases 37 total the earlier you start your neckline the larger the opening of it will be if you want a really wide opening i recommend starting as early as row 8 depending on the width of your shoulders be sure it will still fit you - row 2 chain 3 granny cluster in the next space and along the row to the end 2 double_crochet in the last stitch neckline turn your work when you are ready to start the taper of your how to start the dress row 1 & 2 neckline - row 1 neckline chain 2 granny cluster in each space along the row to the end as normal turn decreasing a granny stitch - row 2 neckline granny cluster along your row as normal stopping one cluster early again double_crochet in the last cluster space turn your work continue to shorten the one side repeating row 1 & - row 3 chain 3 granny cluster in the next space and 2 until your neckline is as deep as you want it to the end of the row 2 double_crochet in the last stitch remember you will need to mirror this on your other side blue dress decreased 5 row green dress decreased 3 row when your neckline is as deep as you want it… - repeat your last row 3 5 times until you are at the center of your chest then mirror what you have done blue dress 3 center row - row 6 neckline chain 3 and 2 double_crochet in the same stitch as the chain 3 granny cluster along the row as normal green dress 2 center row now begin the increase side this should match your decrease side if you made 5 decreases then you will increase 5 times - repeat row 5 and 6 of the neckline until your increase side matches your decrease side when your increase are finished finish off the panel by repeating the next 2 row until it matches your first half - row 5 neckline granny cluster as normal to the blue dress 9 row after neckline decreases neckline of the dress…when you reach the green dress 13 row after neckline decreases neckline put an entire granny stitch in the last -
